S0001.known: I want to speak Chinese with you now.

S0003.known: how to speak as often as possible.

S0004.known: how to say something in Chinese
S0004.target: 怎么用中文说一些东西

S0005.known: I'm going to practise speaking with someone else.

S0006.known: I'm trying to remember a word.

S0007.known: I want to try as hard as I can today.

S0008.known: I'm going to try to explain what I mean.
S0008.target: 我要试着解释我的意思。

S0009.known: I speak a little Chinese now.

S0010.known: I'm not sure if I can remember the whole sentence.
S0010.target: 我不确定我能不能记住整个句子。

S0011.known: I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.
S0011.target: 我想能够在你说完之后说话。

S0012.known: I wouldn't like to guess what's going to happen tomorrow.
S0012.target: 我不想猜明天会发生什么。

S0014.known: Do you speak Chinese all day?

S0015.known: And I want you to speak Chinese with me tomorrow.
S0015.target: 而且我想要你明天和我说中文。

S0016.known: He wants to come back with everyone else later on.
S0016.target: 他想晚点和其他人一起回来。

S0017.known: She wants to find out what the answer is.

S0018.known: We want to meet at six o'clock this evening.
S0018.target: 我们想今天晚上六点见面。

S0019.known: But I don't want to stop talking.

S0020.known: You want to learn his name quickly.
S0020.target: 你想快点学会他的名字。

S0021.known: Why are you learning her name?
S0021.target: 你为什么在学她的名字？

S0022.known: Because I want to meet people who speak Chinese.
S0022.target: 因为我想认识会说中文的人。

S0023.known: I'm going to start talking more soon.
S0023.target: 我很快就要开始多说话了。

S0024.known: I'm not going to be able to remember easily.
S0024.target: 我不会很容易就能记住。

S0025.known: Are you going to help me before I have to go?
S0025.target: 在我必须走之前你会帮我吗？

S0026.known: I like feeling as if I'm nearly ready to go.
S0026.target: 我喜欢感觉好像我快准备好走了。

S0027.known: I don't like taking too much time to answer.
S0027.target: 我不喜欢花太多时间回答。

S0028.known: It's useful to start talking as soon as you can.
S0028.target: 尽快开始说话是有用的。

S0029.known: I'm looking forward to speaking better as soon as I can.
S0029.target: 我期待尽快能说得更好。

S0030.known: I wanted to ask you something yesterday.
S0030.target: 我昨天想问你一些事情。

S0031.known: You wanted to speak with me tonight.

S0032.known: Did you want to show me something?
S0032.target: 你想给我看一些东西吗？

S0033.known: How long have you been learning Chinese?

S0034.known: He doesn't want to be quiet when other people are here.
S0034.target: 当其他人在这里的时候他不想安静。

S0035.known: She doesn't want to read anything this afternoon.
S0035.target: 她今天下午不想读任何东西。

S0036.known: We don't want to interrupt the story.
S0036.target: 我们不想打断这个故事。

S0037.known: I started to think about it carefully last month.
S0037.target: 我上个月开始仔细地考虑这件事。

S0038.known: I've been learning for about a week.
S0038.target: 我已经学了大约一个星期了。

S0039.known: But I'm a little tired this morning.

S0040.known: How do you feel at the moment?

S0041.known: I feel okay, but I'm starting to feel tired.
S0041.target: 我感觉还好，但我开始觉得累了。

S0042.known: I was starting to feel better than last night.
S0042.target: 我开始觉得比昨晚好了。

S0043.known: I wasn't thinking about how to answer.

S0044.known: Or if I need to improve.

S0045.known: I don't need to know everything.
S0045.target: 我不需要知道所有事情。

S0046.known: But I don't worry about making mistakes.

S0047.known: Because I think that it's a good thing to make mistakes.
S0047.target: 因为我认为犯错是件好事。

S0048.known: I don't care about making mistakes.

S0049.known: It's like this, if you know what I mean.
S0049.target: 就是这样，如果你知道我的意思的话。

S0050.known: I'm not trying to finish as quickly as possible.
S0050.target: 我不是在试着尽快完成。

S0051.known: I enjoy doing interesting things with my friends.
S0051.target: 我喜欢和朋友做有趣的事情。

S0052.known: He wanted to write a letter to his friend last week.
S0052.target: 他上周想给他的朋友写封信。

S0053.known: She wanted to put his letter in her bag.
S0053.target: 她想把他的信放进她的包里。

S0054.known: We wanted to give you a little more time.
S0054.target: 我们想多给你一点时间。

S0055.known: I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep very well.
S0055.target: 当我没睡好的时候我不喜欢醒来。

S0056.known: So I can remember how to say a few words.
S0056.target: 这样我就能记住怎么说几个词。

S0057.known: I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say.
S0057.target: 我记不住怎么说我想说的话。

S0058.known: It's interesting when you understand enough words.
S0058.target: 当你理解足够多的词的时候很有趣。

S0059.known: I know how to do what I need to do next week.
S0059.target: 我知道下周我需要做什么。

S0060.known: I don't know how to say enough different words yet.
S0060.target: 我还不知道怎么说足够多不同的词。

S0061.known: Could you say that again a little more slowly?
S0061.target: 你能再慢一点说一遍吗？

S0062.known: I'm not sure if I can help you at the same time.
S0062.target: 我不确定我能不能同时帮你。

S0063.known: Are you sure you don't mind helping me?
S0063.target: 你确定你不介意帮我吗？

S0064.known: Learning Chinese isn't easy but it is fun.
S0064.target: 学中文不容易，但很有趣。

S0065.known: It's important to take time to test yourself.
S0065.target: 花时间测试自己很重要。

S0066.known: It's not difficult to find the answer.

S0067.known: Why do you want to stop?

S0069.known: He didn't want to look after the young dog all afternoon.
S0069.target: 他不想整个下午都照顾那只小狗。

S0070.known: She didn't want to tell me where it was.
S0070.target: 她不想告诉我它在哪里。

S0071.known: 我们不想让任何人听到真相。
S0071.target: We didn't want to let anyone hear the truth.

S0072.target: I think that you're doing very well.

S0073.known: 非常感谢，但是我还有更多要学习。
S0073.target: Thank you very much, but I've got more to learn.

S0074.known: 非常感谢你帮助我理解。
S0074.target: Thank you very much for helping me to understand.

S0075.target: Have you got more to learn?

S0076.known: 我对我已经学了这么多感到很高兴。
S0076.target: I'm very happy with how much I've learnt already.

S0077.known: 我对我开始理解得这么快感到惊讶。
S0077.target: I'm surprised at how quickly I'm starting to understand.

S0078.target: I don't understand what you said.

S0079.known: 你什么时候开始学习的？
S0079.target: When did you start to learn?

S0080.known: 我不确定我什么时候会准备好。
S0080.target: I'm not sure when I'll be ready.

S0081.target: When do you want to start?

S0082.known: 我不会等你。为什么不呢？
S0082.target: I'm not going to wait for you. Why not?

S0083.known: 我同意你对你朋友说的话。
S0083.target: I agree with what you said about your friend.

S0084.known: 我不同意他对我朋友说的话。
S0084.target: I don't agree with what he said about my friend.

S0086.known: 不幸的是，这是不可能的。

S0087.target: They are people I don't know.

S0088.known: 我还没准备好和我不认识的人说话。
S0088.target: I'm not ready to talk to people I don't know yet.

S0089.known: 我认为我在短时间内做了很多。
S0089.target: I think that I've done a lot in a short time.

S0090.known: 如果你能说得慢一点那就太好了。
S0090.target: If you can speak more slowly that would be great.

S0091.known: 很难想得足够快来及时回答。
S0091.target: It's difficult to think quickly enough to answer in time.

S0092.known: 我想继续做这个一段时间。
S0092.target: I'd like to keep on doing this for a while.

S0094.known: 这是唯一的方法让它起作用。
S0094.target: This is the only way it will work.

S0095.target: Are you ready to go home on the next bus?

S0096.known: 不，我还没准备好，我需要多一点时间。
S0096.target: No I'm not ready yet, I need a little more time.

S0097.known: 是的，我准备好了，只要你想我就可以走。
S0097.target: Yes I'm ready to go as soon as you want.

S0098.known: 我应该考虑玩别的东西。
S0098.target: I should consider playing something else.

S0099.known: 你应该问问你自己为什么它不起作用。
S0099.target: You should ask yourself why it's not working.

S0100.known: 你不应该担心做类似的事情。
S0100.target: You shouldn't worry about doing something similar.

S0101.known: 我很享受了解更多关于这个语言的事情。
S0101.target: I'm enjoying finding out more about this language.

S0102.known: 我们正在试图说它不是那样的。
S0102.target: We're trying to say that it's not like that.

S0103.known: 我们不是在试图听更多的词。
S0103.target: We're not trying to hear many more words.

S0104.known: 我们需要改变我们正在做的事情。
S0104.target: We need to change what we're doing.

S0105.known: 这就是为什么他不知道答案。
S0105.target: That is why he didn't know the answer.

S0106.known: 我们不需要感到高兴，我们只需要努力工作。
S0106.target: We don't need to feel happy, we just need to work hard.

S0107.known: 我们希望看到你正在做什么。
S0107.target: We hoped to see what you were doing.

S0108.known: 我们没有希望在半夜醒来。
S0108.target: We didn't hope to wake in the middle of the night.

S0109.known: 我们必须努力工作来学习很多新词。
S0109.target: We must work hard to learn a lot of new words.

S0110.known: 我们是朋友，在我们结束后我想放松一下。
S0110.target: We're friends, and after we finish I'd like to relax.

S0111.known: 当我们学习新东西的时候它改变我们的大脑。
S0111.target: When we learn something new it changes our brain.

S0112.known: 那非常有趣，我没有期待它。
S0112.target: That was very interesting, and I wasn't expecting it.

S0113.target: Why can't I remember what you said?

S0116.known: 这不是我能做的最好选择。

S0117.known: 我绝对做得比我们上次互相交谈时更好。

S0118.known: 我感觉比我们在酒吧时我感觉的更好。
S0118.target: I feel better than I felt when we were in the pub.

S0119.target: Can I ask you something before you leave?

S0122.known: 它开始感觉更容易了，我对它的进展感到兴奋。
S0122.target: It's starting to feel easier and I'm excited about how it's going.

S0123.target: I think that's a good idea.

S0124.target: I thought that was a good idea.

S0125.known: 我相信你的主意非常好。
S0125.target: I believe that your idea was very good.

S0126.known: 这个工作正在改变我大脑的形状。

S0127.target: That isn't why I wanted to see you.

S0128.known: 你像我以前认识的某个人。
S0128.target: You're like someone I used to know.

S0129.known: 我很高兴你做得这么好。
S0129.target: I'm so happy that you're doing so well.

S0130.known: 那是个惊喜，因为他是我的朋友。
S0130.target: That was a surrpise, because he's my friend.

S0131.known: 有太多想法在我的脑海里转。
S0131.target: There are too many ideas going around in my head.

S0132.known: 那比她正在说的不那么令人兴奋。
S0132.target: That's less exciting than what she was saying.

S0133.known: 当你们一起工作的时候你会非常了解一个人。
S0133.target: You get to know someone very well when you work together.

S0134.known: 当你和他们一起做困难的事情时这不是问题。
S0134.target: It's not a problem when you work at something difficult with them.

S0135.known: 我不知道为什么你认为它这么好。
S0135.target: I don't know why you think that it's so good.

S0136.known: 当然你可以问她，因为她是我的朋友。
S0136.target: Of course you can ask her because she's my friend.

S0137.known: 经常说话比完美更重要。
S0137.target: It's more important to talk often than to be perfect.

S0138.known: 这是我朋友想要和我们见面的地方。
S0138.target: This was where my friend wanted to meet us.

S0139.known: 对不起我需要这么早离开。
S0139.target: I'm sorry that I need to leave so early.

S0140.known: 对不起我看不到你试图给我看的东西。
S0140.target: I'm sorry that I can't see what you're trying to show me.

S0142.known: 你真好，我很感激你帮助我。
S0142.target: That's very kind of you and I'm grateful to you for helping.

S0143.known: 这和我们之前谈论的是同一件事。
S0143.target: It's the same thing as we were talking about earlier.

S0144.known: 我今天早上醒得比我想要的早。
S0144.target: I woke earlier than I wanted to this morning.

S0145.target: Why are you not happy any more?

S0146.known: 自从我们试图修理它以来，似乎什么都不工作了。
S0146.target: Nothing seems to be working since we tried to fix it.

S0147.known: 当她看到我感到紧张时，她非常友好。
S0147.target: She was very kind when she saw me feeling nervous.

S0148.known: 当我不能回答时，他不是很耐心。
S0148.target: He wasn't very patient when I couldn't answer.

S0151.target: That wasn't what I was hoping would happen.

S0161.target: Can you give me that book on Sunday morning?

S0165.known: 但是我不确定它是不是真的。
S0165.target: But I'm not sure if it's true.

S0166.known: 我的名字不是很不寻常。

S0172.target: Yes that would be very helpful.

S0173.known: 不用了，谢谢，我可以自己应付。
S0173.target: No thank you I can manage on my own.

S0174.known: 你能理解我在说什么吗？

S0175.known: 你想在星期天早上做什么？

S0186.target: Do you want to talk about something different next week?

S0188.target: So I don't need to change.

S0191.target: No I don't mind at all.

S0193.target: I'm sorry but I'm too busy today.

S0201.known: 我们想知道会发生什么。

S0202.known: 没有人确定如何回答这个问题。

S0207.known: 你已经做了你需要做的事。

S0225.known: 如果他能，他会给你一个答案。

S0226.target: The man is trying to help me.

S0227.known: 那个男人会告诉我一些新的东西。

S0228.known: 那个男人刚开始练习说话。

S0242.target: I want to give her more time.

S0243.target: I'm going to ask for the same thing to eat.

S0246.target: I wanted her to help you but she was too busy.

S0247.target: I thought that book was fairly good.

S0249.known: 我想让你在走之前帮助我。
S0249.target: I want you to help me before you go.

S0251.known: 我不想在我们完成之后才知道。

S0256.known: 我想我不到一个小时就准备好。
S0256.target: I think I'll be ready in less than an hour.

S0260.target: I don't have the faintest idea.

S0266.target: He was an old friend of my father.

S0270.target: Because I'm worried that I'm going to be late.

S0279.target: Yes because there wasn't much time left.

S0289.target: I wonder if she's going to be there this afternoon.

S0292.target: I hope you'll be able to come to the party.

S0297.target: I don't know many people who speak Chinese.

S0298.target: I've got nothing left to say.

S0317.target: Yes I think she could if she wanted to.

S0403.target: We should remain quiet for as long as possible.

S0408.target: Yes that's the best way to make a happy family.

S0409.known: 不，我们做什么都不重要。

S0411.target: We would like to reserve a table for four tonight.

S0412.known: 我们不能让他们赢得一切。

S0415.known: 如果你问我，那不会是个问题。

S0416.target: They want to lead the way next year.

S0418.target: They need to serve the community.

S0419.known: 如果他们想让人们喜欢他们。
S0419.target: If they want people to like them.

S0420.known: 他们不需要问他多大了。
S0420.target: They don't need to ask how old he is.

S0421.known: Because they already know he's getting weak.

S0425.known: Yes they need to make sure they understand.

S0426.known: They would like to love each other but they're unhappy.
S0426.target: 他们想要彼此相爱，但他们不开心。

S0427.known: They wouldn't like you to think that they're bored.
S0427.target: 他们不想让你觉得他们无聊。

S0429.known: Yes that would be perfect for them.
S0429.target: 是的，那对他们来说是完美的。

S0431.known: They're not ready yet but they'll be ready soon.
S0431.target: 他们还没有准备好，但他们很快就准备好。

S0432.known: They could mean that they want you to ask.

S0464.known: I told her my room number once but she forgot it.
S0464.target: 我告诉过她一次我的房间号，但她忘了。

S0465.known: Next time I will ask her what her name is.
S0465.target: 下次我会问她叫什么名字。

S0466.known: Let me throw it over the wall.

S0467.known: It's next to the car park.

S0469.known: But that doesn't mean we can't change it.
S0469.target: 但那不意味着我们不能改变它。

S0470.known: How high do you want to climb before we stop?
S0470.target: 你想在我们停下来之前爬多高？

S0471.known: Do you want to stop for a rest?

S0472.known: Part of the problem is that we don't know the facts.
S0472.target: 问题的一部分是我们不知道事实。

S0474.known: I don't even want it as a free offer.
S0474.target: 我甚至不想要它作为免费提供。

S0475.known: There are many reasons to consider waiting.

S0476.known: I'm waiting for the end of the second half.
S0476.target: 我在等待下半场的结束。

S0477.known: He's been sick since the second day of the holidays.
S0477.target: 他从假期的第二天起就一直生病。

S0478.known: She has such a kind heart.

S0479.known: It's the least I could do.
S0479.target: 这是我能做的最少的事。

S0480.known: Whatever he says it's not far ahead now.
S0480.target: 无论他说什么，它现在不远了。

S0481.known: It's the only real hope we have left.
S0481.target: 这是我们剩下的唯一真正的希望。

S0482.known: The only real hope is that they're not serious.
S0482.target: 唯一真正的希望是他们不是认真的。

S0483.known: Life isn't easy but it's not meant to be easy.
S0483.target: 生活不容易，但它本来就不应该容易。

S0484.known: It's meant to be a challenge.

S0485.known: Nothing would make me happier than to get away.
S0485.target: 没有什么比逃离更让我开心的了。

S0486.known: I think your eyes are beautiful.

S0488.known: It's on the other side of that yellow line.
S0488.target: 它在那条黄线的另一边。

S0489.known: If you don't make me a strong cup of coffee right now.
S0489.target: 如果你现在不给我泡一杯浓咖啡。

S0490.known: Then I will never trust anyone ever again.
S0490.target: 那么我再也不会相信任何人了。

S0491.known: I love the way you try to help.
S0491.target: 我喜欢你努力帮助的方式。

S0492.known: Which of those places do you think is the most interesting?
S0492.target: 你觉得那些地方中哪个最有趣？

S0494.known: What happens after the first part of the show?
S0494.target: 演出的第一部分之后会发生什么？

S0496.known: I'm not planning to lose when it really matters.
S0496.target: 我不打算在真正重要的时候输。

S0497.known: That sounds as though you need to get some sleep.
S0497.target: 听起来好像你需要睡一觉。

S0498.known: He's standing alone over there inside the entrance.
S0498.target: 他一个人站在那边入口里面。

S0499.known: Maybe we should open the door and close the window.
S0499.target: 也许我们应该开门关窗。

S0500.known: Why don't you want to sit between the two girls?
S0500.target: 你为什么不想坐在两个女孩中间？

S0501.known: If only I could trust you to play together without arguing.
S0501.target: 要是我能相信你们一起玩不吵架就好了。

S0502.known: She almost got lost because she turned left instead of right.
S0502.target: 她差点迷路，因为她向左转而不是向右转。

S0503.known: I hate making trouble but that one's mine.
S0503.target: 我讨厌制造麻烦，但那个是我的。

S0504.known: I'm going to run across the grass.

S0505.known: So that I don't get left behind.

S0506.known: I used to live around here years ago before we moved.
S0506.target: 多年前我们搬家之前，我以前住在这附近。

S0508.known: There's no point worrying about how you're going to pay.
S0508.target: 担心你将如何付钱没有意义。

S0509.known: I heard that you're going to pay for a new bed.
S0509.target: 我听说你要买一张新床。

S0510.known: She's gone to look for somewhere safe to park the car.
S0510.target: 她去找一个安全的地方停车了。

S0511.known: The news took several hours to reach everyone in the office.
S0511.target: 这个消息花了几个小时才传到办公室的每个人。

S0512.known: Can you hold the door open while I fetch the keys?
S0512.target: 我去拿钥匙的时候你能把门开着吗？

S0513.known: It hurts most when I move my head up and down.
S0513.target: 当我上下移动头部时最疼。

S0514.known: I found the perfect house on the first day.
S0514.target: 我第一天就找到了完美的房子。

S0515.known: On the first day of the new year.

S0516.known: They both came on their own.
S0516.target: 他们两个都是自己来的。

S0517.known: But they left with each other.

S0518.known: I couldn't imagine myself having exactly the same problem.
S0518.target: 我无法想象自己有完全相同的问题。

S0519.known: I haven't seen their new baby yet.
S0519.target: 我还没见过他们的新宝宝。

S0520.known: It might have happened to the whole family.
S0520.target: 这可能发生在整个家庭身上。

S0521.known: I'm afraid that you'll forget why we needed to stay here.
S0521.target: 我担心你会忘记我们为什么需要留在这里。

S0522.known: Let's agree that it was stupid to tell the truth.
S0522.target: 我们同意说实话是愚蠢的吧。

S0524.known: I'll call you back in three or four minutes.
S0524.target: 我三四分钟后给你回电话。

S0525.known: To check if you've been able to finish.

S0526.known: I'm finding it hard to believe that you can't guess.

S0527.known: Guess who told me that funny story.
S0527.target: 猜猜是谁告诉我那个有趣的故事。

S0528.known: I'm probably supposed to keep those things in another room.
S0528.target: 我可能应该把那些东西放在另一个房间。

S0529.known: Can you all put your hands up?

S0531.known: It isn't true that anyone can win the game.
S0531.target: 并非任何人都能赢得比赛是真的。

S0533.known: She won't listen to every word you say.
S0533.target: 她不会听你说的每一个字。

S0534.known: Let's not go outside in this dreadful weather.
S0534.target: 我们别在这糟糕的天气出去吧。

S0535.known: He made a promise that he wouldn't choose the wrong job.
S0535.target: 他承诺不会选择错误的工作。

S0536.known: I used to think that being crazy was bad.
S0536.target: 我以前认为疯狂是不好的。

S0538.known: I don't want to seem as though I don't care.
S0538.target: 我不想显得好像我不在乎。

S0540.known: I don't mind if you want to leave without the car.
S0540.target: 如果你想不开车离开，我不介意。

S0541.known: It's a good idea to try and breathe slowly.
S0541.target: 试着慢慢呼吸是个好主意。

S0542.target: 每当你感到生气的时候。

S0544.known: Whoever said it would be difficult was absolutely right.
S0544.target: 无论谁说这会很难，都是完全正确的。

S0545.known: It's your turn to take the clean clothes upstairs.
S0545.target: 轮到你把干净的衣服拿上楼了。

S0546.known: The dog is dirty and wet.

S0547.known: Because he has been playing in the mud.

S0548.known: I am feeling sad at the moment.

S0549.known: Because I have got to be quiet.

S0552.known: The church at the other end of the village is ugly.
S0552.target: 村子另一头的教堂很丑。

S0553.known: I think the small church is very ugly.

S0555.known: And I'm too tired to fetch a new one.
S0555.target: 而且我太累了，拿不了新的。

S0556.known: They play music late at night.

S0557.known: I wish they wouldn't play such loud music.
S0557.target: 我希望他们不要放这么大声的音乐。

S0559.known: Have you found the path through the wood?
S0559.target: 你找到穿过树林的小路了吗？

S0560.known: It goes down to the beach

S0561.known: I don't care if it's a fast car.
S0561.target: 我不在乎它是不是快车。

S0562.known: I just want to get there safely.

S0563.known: I wouldn't have been able to keep going any longer.
S0563.target: 我不会能够继续下去了。

S0564.known: I wouldn't have been able to without your help.
S0564.target: 没有你的帮助我不会能够做到。

S0565.known: I'd have thought about it more carefully.

S0566.known: I'd have thought more if it had been my choice.
S0566.target: 如果是我的选择，我会想得更多。

S0567.known: It's been lovely spending time outdoors watching the children play.
S0567.target: 在户外看孩子们玩耍度过时间很美好。

S0568.known: I'm expecting to see an improvement next time we meet.
S0568.target: 我期待下次我们见面时看到进步。

S0569.known: Have you decided how much you are willing to pay?
S0569.target: 你决定了你愿意付多少钱吗？

S0570.known: How much are you willing to pay for your ticket?
S0570.target: 你愿意为你的票付多少钱？

S0571.known: I'm not convinced that would be a very good idea.
S0571.target: 我不相信那会是个好主意。

S0572.known: Have you forgotten what happened the last time they visited us?
S0572.target: 你忘记上次他们来看我们时发生了什么吗？

S0573.known: It's the kind of thing that makes the holidays very special.
S0573.target: 这是让假期很特别的那种事。

S0574.known: The holidays are very special for everyone.
S0574.target: 假期对每个人都很特别。

S0576.known: It has been very upsetting waiting.

S0577.known: We've been waiting for the news from the hospital.
S0577.target: 我们一直在等医院的消息。

S0580.known: We've often wanted to take the children somewhere a little warmer.
S0580.target: 我们经常想带孩子们去稍微暖和一点的地方。

S0581.known: He'd like to know a little more about what it's like.
S0581.target: 他想知道更多关于它是什么样的。

S0582.known: What's it like to grow up here?
S0582.target: 在这里长大是什么样的？

S0583.known: What's it like in this part of the world?
S0583.target: 世界的这个地方是什么样的？

S0584.known: What's it like to wake up every morning and see the mountains?
S0584.target: 每天早上醒来看到山是什么样的？

S0585.known: I can see the mountains out of my bedroom window.
S0585.target: 我能从我的卧室窗户看到山。

S0587.known: She used to insist that we had eggs for supper.
S0587.target: 她过去总是坚持我们晚饭吃鸡蛋。

S0588.known: So I wanted to grow up and leave home.

S0589.known: She told me she'd just seen the last bus.
S0589.target: 她告诉我她刚看到最后一班公交车。

S0590.known: I saw the last bus leaving the station.
S0590.target: 我看到最后一班公交车离开车站。

S0591.known: She followed me down to the shops.

S0593.known: However much I argued I still had to share.
S0593.target: 无论我争论多少，我还是要分享。

S0594.known: I had to share my toys with my sister.
S0594.target: 我不得不和我妹妹分享我的玩具。

S0595.known: I need to lie down in the garden.

S0596.known: And I need to close my eyes for a while.
S0596.target: 我需要闭上眼睛一会儿。

S0597.known: I suspect that he's heard a hundred stories about it.
S0597.target: 我怀疑他听过关于它的一百个故事。

S0598.known: He's heard a thousand stories about what they were doing.
S0598.target: 他听过关于他们在做什么的一千个故事。

S0599.known: I'd have been happy to drive if you'd told me.
S0599.target: 如果你告诉我，我会很高兴开车。

S0600.known: I'd have driven if you'd told me how tired you were.
S0600.target: 如果你告诉我你有多累，我会开车。

S0601.known: We were talking about how it all started.
S0601.target: 我们在谈论这一切是如何开始的。

S0602.known: How it started in the first place.

S0603.known: We didn't have anywhere to live at the time.

S0604.known: She offered to let us stay with her.
S0604.target: 她提出让我们和她住在一起。

S0606.known: If I'd known then what I know now I'd have waited.
S0606.target: 如果我当时知道我现在知道的，我会等待。

S0607.known: If I'd known I'd have done things differently.
S0607.target: 如果我知道，我会做不同的事。

S0608.known: It would have been the sensible thing to do.

S0609.known: The sensible thing to do would have been to ask.

S0610.known: He needs to look for work.

S0611.known: I would have been ready to look somewhere else.
S0611.target: 我会准备好去别的地方看看。

S0613.known: We probably would have bought a house there.
S0613.target: 我们可能会在那里买房子。

S0614.known: It's near where your family live.
S0614.target: 它靠近你家人住的地方。

S0615.known: I thought you were very brave to say that.
S0615.target: 我认为你说那个很勇敢。

S0616.known: You were very brave to say you thought that.
S0616.target: 你说你认为那个很勇敢。

S0617.known: You thought that it was a mistake.

S0618.known: It doesn't feel like a long time.

S0619.known: It's a long time since we saw each other.
S0619.target: 自从我们见面已经很长时间了。

S0620.known: It's a very long time since we last saw each other.
S0620.target: 自从我们上次见面已经很长时间了。

S0621.known: I wouldn't have dared to tell her that it was broken.

S0622.known: I knew that the children had broken it.
S0622.target: 我知道孩子们弄坏了它。

S0623.known: Do you want a cup of coffee or tea?
S0623.target: 你想要一杯咖啡还是茶？

S0624.known: Yes, that would be great, please.

S0625.known: Do you want something to drink?

S0626.known: No, I'm not thirsty, thank you.

S0629.known: I like it with milk but without sugar.
S0629.target: 我喜欢加牛奶但不加糖。

S0630.known: Can I have something to drink please?

S0633.target: A large glass of water would be fine.

S0636.target: I think that that is Jane's bag.

S0641.known: 我认为是那把椅子上的红色的那个。
S0641.target: I think that it's the red one on that chair.

S0650.target: Do you want to go madam?

S0654.known: 我不确定我能不能帮您，先生。
S0654.target: I'm not sure if I can help you, sir.

S0655.known: 我认为您做得很好，女士。
S0655.target: I think that you're doing very well, madam.

S0661.known: 你们大家都在做什么事

S0664.known: 你们大家都准备好了吗？

S0665.target: Do you all want to go?

S0666.known: 你们大家都认为怎么样？

S0668.known: 我希望你们大家都能去
S0668.target: I hope you'll all be able to go
